author: vhennebert
msg: Added possibility to use glyphs outside WinAnsiEncoding for TrueType fonts that are not embedded in the PostScript file, and that don't have a list of glyph names ('post' table version 3).
This is done by creating glyph names using Adobe's convention (/u1234) and adding a CharStrings table that maps those glyph names to the actual glyph index.

author: bcall
msg: TS-414 Update so the pristine URL will work for reverse and forward
proxy.  Also, clearing the url on transaction close.

msg: PIG-1483: [piggybank] Add HadoopJobHistoryLoader to the piggybank
